reviewText: You want good clean fun to watch comedy then any of the Bananas Videos are what you are looking for.  I think we have all of them and we still buy them as gifts for friends and relatives.  Family fun and entertainment for all ages.  Something you can watch with your children and grandchildren and all laugh together.

David Pendleton...Just a great funny guy...had us laughing from start to finish.
Great for the whole family!  Would recommend this to anyone who wants to laugh!
